Attacks.Name: Water Shuriken
Attacks.Effect: After this attack is resolved, this character gains power equal to the damage dealt. If a wild is rolled, apply the Bleed special condition to the target character.

Attacks.Name: Quick Attack
Attacks.Effect: After this attack is resolved, Frogadier may make an immediate move action.

Attacks.Name: Bubble Beam
Attacks.Effect: This attack deals damage to all characters within range 1 of the target character. If a wild is rolled, also apply the Slow special condition to those characters.

Superpowers.Name: Ninja Leap
Superpowers.Effect: Frogadier makes an immediate move action. This superpower can be used only once per turn.

Superpowers.Name: Stealthy Approach
Superpowers.Effect: Until the start of its next activation, Frogadier adds 2 dice to its defense rolls when attacked from more than range 3.

Attacks.Name: Shadow Sneak
Attacks.Effect: If this attack deals damage, Frogadier gains Stealth special condition, making it harder to target until the end of its next activation.

Superpowers.Name: Evasive Maneuver
Superpowers.Effect: After being attacked, use this superpower to make an immediate move action. This superpower can be used only once per turn.

Superpowers.Name: Evolution
Superpowers.Effect: Replace this character with a Greninja character of the same injured status. The new character begins with damage equal to the damage on this character and power equal to the power on this character.
